name: Yordle Duskblade of Draktharr
passive: Nightstalker: After takedown, become invisible for 1.5 seconds (90 second cooldown). Your next attack deals 99 (+30% bonus AD) bonus physical damage.

This item is best purchased on AD assassins who can attack quickly and decisively after being spotted.
The large lethality boost this item provides makes it especially effective against squishy targets like mages or marksmen.
